net.asrex.skillful.perk

Class Perk

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.asrex.skillful.perk.Perk

  • public class Perk
extends java.lang.Object
    A Perk is an earned or purchased group of Effect instances associated with a particular player.

    Note that subclasses must have a no-args constructor!

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new perk.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

      • readNBT

        public void readNBT(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound tag)

      • writeNBT

        public void writeNBT(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound tag)
        Serializes this Perk to the given NBT tag. Subclasses should override this method if additional persistent data needs to be stored; however, super.writeNBT() must be called to ensure deserializtion can occur.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag to write data into

      • canActivate

        public boolean canActivate(int currentTick)
        Determines if this perk has a cooldown, and if so, whether or not it has passed. If no cooldown exists, or if the perk has not been previously activated, true is also returned.
        Parameters:
        currentTick - the current player tick (see EntityPlayer.ticksExisted)
        Returns:
        true if the perk can be activated, false if not

      • getCooldownTicksRemaining

        public int getCooldownTicksRemaining(int currentTick)
        Determines the number of cooldown ticks remaining. If this perk has no cooldown, or if the cooldown has already passed, 0 is returned.
        Parameters:
        currentTick - the current player tick
        Returns:
        the number of ticks remaining in the cooldown, or 0

      • getCooldownTimeRemaining

        public double getCooldownTimeRemaining(int currentTick)
        Gets the remaining cooldown time in seconds.
        Parameters:
        currentTick - the current player tick
        Returns:
        the number of seconds remaining in the cooldown

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • fromNBT

        public static Perk fromNBT(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound tag)
        Deserializes a Perk from the given NBT tag. A Perk instance of the appropriate type will be returned.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag to read perk data from
        Returns:
        a Perk instance, or null if no perk could be loaded
